name: The Leak
description:
Wake up, watch tv, make a cup of cofffee and try to bear your own meaningless existence.

Feaures:
- Minimalist, grayscale graphics.
- No challenges, puzzles. Just click here there.
- Short gameplay. (20-30 minutes-maybe?)
- Two endings
- Depressive rhetoric on life and death
- English voice acting
- A dark main theme to accompany you
